description: GPU health monitoring dashboard for OKE workloads to GPU health checks mapping boards.

options.content:
# OCI GPU Scanner - OKE Worklaods to GPU mapping
Dedicated grafana board to help slice the Kubernetes workloads and job assciation to GPU node.

panels.description: Dr HPC V2 based passive checks scan results
panels.title: OCI GPU Scanner - PASSIVE health check summary

panels.description: Active checks performance health check results
panels.title: OCI GPU Scanner - ACTIVE health check summary

panels.description: Flops utilizations by GPU and by Node
panels.title: Avg model flops achieved by node

panels.description: Monitors hardware sensor temperatures and critical thresholds as exposed by Linux hwmon. Includes CPU, GPU, and motherboard sensors where available
panels.title: Hardware Temperature Monitor

title: OCI GPU Scanner - OKE to Scanner Tracking Board
